scripts.compileswagger: multi-file-swagger multifile.yaml > api/swagger/swagger.json && json2yaml ./api/swagger/swagger.json > ./api/swagger/swagger.yaml && swagger validate ./api/swagger/swagger.yaml
scripts.startdev: npm run compileswagger && nodemon --watch ./api --ignore 'api/swagger/swagger*.*' -e js,yaml,json,yml api/server/server.js
scripts.startdeploy: npm run compileswagger && pm2-docker start api/server/server.js -i max
scripts.debugdev: npm run compileswagger && nodemon --inspect=0.0.0.0:5555 --watch ./api --ignore 'api/swagger/swagger*.*' -e js,yaml,json,yml api/server/server.js
scripts.test: npm run compileswagger && swagger project test
